properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
NEW JERSEY.
FLARES SIGHTED VICINITY 39-23.66N 073-50.71W
AT 110008Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK, INMARSAT-C: 430370670,
TELEX: 127775, PHONE: 757 398 6231,
FAX: 757 398 6392, E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
